content.p: Some of the in-sessional topics include: Students may access the full in-sessional workshop schedule and register for the workshops on our Moodle page. To better cater to the needs of postgraduate students, we offer one-to-one writing consultation sessions to postgraduate students currently enrolled at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. These sessions are conducted by appointment only to provide personalised task-specific writing support for postgraduate students with the goal of helping postgraduate students become better writers. This is not a proofreading or editing service for theses and dissertations.This service is strictly limited to postgraduate students only. For more information about the Writing Centre and to request for an appointment, please visit our Moodle page. For further inquiries pertaining to CELFEâ€™s in-sessional support and the Writing Centre at CELFE, please reach out to us at in-sessional.english@nottingham.edu.my. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8012
